articles.title: Police investigating woman who refused to wear mask despite requests from safe distancing ambassador - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Police investigating woman who refused to wear mask despite requests from safe distancing ambassador
articles.content:
It has been reported that a woman who refused to wear face mask at Marina Bay Sands is being investigated by the police.
The Police said in a statement on Saturday evening (15 May) that a 53-year-ol… [+2308 chars]
